alert.note: Alert for Guernsey; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GUERNSEY AND NORTHERN NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Concord, or 7 miles southwest of Cambridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Byesville, Antrim, Quaker City, Senecaville, Pleasant City, Cumberland, Lore City, Old Washington, Summerfield, Sarahsville, and Salesville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 171 and 197. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 31 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
